name: tine20/proc-wrap
description: A PHP proc_open wrapper to handle multiple async background processes with timeout support

scripts.dockerLint: cd docker; docker-compose run cli ash -c 'cd /procWrap; find ./src -type f -exec php -l {} \; | grep -v "No syntax errors detected in" || find ./test -type f -exec php -l {} \; | grep -v "No syntax errors detected in" || echo "php -l [OK]"'
scripts.dockerPhpStan: cd docker; docker-compose run cli ash -c 'cd /procWrap; vendor/bin/phpstan analyse --level 8 ./src ./test'
scripts.dockerPhpStanClear: cd docker; docker-compose run cli ash -c 'cd /procWrap; vendor/bin/phpstan clear-result-cache'
scripts.dockerCS: cd docker; docker-compose run cli ash -c 'cd /procWrap; vendor/bin/phpcs -s ./src ./test'
scripts.dockerUnitTest: cd docker; docker-compose run cli ash -c 'cd /procWrap; vendor/bin/phpunit ./test/AllTests.php'
